metadata.name: BASED NFT
metadata.description: We have released a small NFT collection of 500, .04ETH each. 3 out of those 500, will be a golden ticket. The person that mints a golden ticket is automatically sent 1 ETH. The other 497 are put into a daily draw.\nOur NFT's not only give you a collectable in your wallet they give you a chance to win daily ETH prizes. 500 NFT'S will be minted in total at a value of 0.4ETH. Out of the 500 NFT'S, 3 will hold the golden ticket reward, automatically holding these NFT's will win you 1ETH. The remaining 497 will be entered into a daily prize draw.
